{{Mergeto|Men Without Hats|date=March 2010}} '''Allen McCarthy''' (July 11, 1957 - August 11, 1995) was a [[Canada|Canadian]] musician born in [[Montreal, Quebec]] who became part of the group [[Men Without Hats]].
"Men Without Hats" disbanded in 1992 and three years later McCarthy died of [[AIDS]]-related causes at the age of 38. He is buried in the [[Mount Royal Cemetery]] in Montreal.
